Configuration fileÂ¶

The CADDOK_BASE/etc directory contains a power_reports.conf file in which you can configure texts for standard e-mail dispatch, among other things.

Moreover, you must set the REPORT_ELINK_SERVER_URL variable correctly here if you would like to display PowerReports in the form of eLink.
